title: Mariposa Apts..Gorgeous Newly Remodeled 1 Bedroom..CALL NOW!
posting_body: The Mariposa Apartments brings comfortable, contemporary living in the midst of exciting experiences that Los Angeles, CA has to offer.
We are located in the heart of Koreatown.
With easy access to I-10 and I-110, commuting is a breeze, by setting you minutes away from Downtown LA and Hollywood.
This is LA, so endless shopping, entertainment, and dining are at your disposal.
We are a short drive to Larchmont Village and Hancock Park, as well as minutes to LA Live, Staples Center, USC, and Downtown.
We proudly carry a Walk Score of 94, and are within walking distance to the Metro Rail at Normandie/Wilshire.
Our chick bachelor, studio and 1-bedroom apartment community is just what you're looking for.
Come home to newly-renovated stylish apartments with beautiful finishes.

Some of our homes are remodeled with hardwood floors throughout unit, quartz kitchen counters, stainless steel appliances, spacious, all new lighting and plumbing fixtures, ceiling fan, heater, custom paint colors, high ceilings and more.
Our residents enjoy some of the best community amenities available in apartment home living.
We are proud to feature controlled access, on-site laundry facilities, and a responsive on-call management team.
Check out our photo gallery to get the feel of our community, then call us to find out how you can make The Mariposa Apartments your home today.
